attributes.action: OUT OF HOURS DROP-OFF OPTION NEEDED TO SAVE WILDLIFE
attributes.additional_details:
No urgent care when its a life and death situation.
Instead they end up in peoples homes or left on the side of a road.
We so desperately want to get the animals the help it needs to Survive and then deeply saddened,lefted helpless when we are told there's no help available. 
Wildlife in the UK are loved and a great importance to us all. 
We need to save all the wildlife we can at this time of crisis. 
Give our wildlife the love and care when they need us the most. 
SAVE THEM, SAVE US.
attributes.background:
Many animals that I myself have experienced suffer greatly due to Leck of urgent care during late evenings and nights.
This After hours option is needed to those willing to bring the animals to the centers.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332097

The Government is not currently responsible for veterinary care for animals, but the request made by the above petition would make the Government responsible for this, which could include providing out of hours services.
